data.text:
They're cheap! They're cheap! Freshly 
picked carrots, for a bargain price!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
󠁿They're cheap! They're cheap! Freshly 
󠁿picked carrots, for a bargain price!

data.text:
And if you act now, as an added bonus you can become a member of 
Team <Sirius>! If you don't hurry, they'll be sold out!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿And if you act now, as an added bonus you can become a member of 
󠁿Team <Sirius>! If you don't hurry, they'll be sold out!

data.text: Will this really bring in new members……?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Will this really bring in new members……?

data.text: I get the feeling they'd join even if we didn't do anything……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿I get the feeling they'd join even if we didn't do anything……

data.text:
But this is where we need to be assertive! 
Otherwise the other teams will take all the talented girls!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿But this is where we need to be assertive! 
󠁿Otherwise the other teams will take all the talented girls!

data.text:
Come on, Brian, if you keep making such a scary face, 
nobody's gonna stop by, you know?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿Come on, Brian, if you keep making such a scary face, 
󠁿nobody's gonna stop by, you know?

data.text: This is my normal face though.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: 󠁿This is my normal face though.

data.text:
With the coming of Spring, many Uma Musume wearing brand new 
uniforms passed through the academy's gates―
data.processed:
󠁿With the coming of Spring, many Uma Musume wearing brand new 
󠁿uniforms passed through the academy's gates―

data.text:
These girls that had just barely started out, 
with all their aspirations and anxieties, all 
had various expressions on their faces.
data.processed:
󠁿These girls that had just barely started out, 
󠁿with all their aspirations and anxieties, all 
󠁿had various expressions on their faces.

data.text: But it was clear in their eyes, they were focused on their dreams.
data.processed: 󠁿But it was clear in their eyes, they were focused on their dreams.

data.text: Trainer-san! I've finished putting up the posters!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san! I've finished putting up the posters!

data.text: We've properly put up ours too!
data.name: Bob-cut Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿We've properly put up ours too!

data.text:
At the gate～, at the dorm's cafeteria～, 
and even some of the classrooms.
data.name: Droopy-eyed Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿At the gate～, at the dorm's cafeteria～, 
󠁿and even some of the classrooms.

data.text:
With this hopefully some more girls that want to join Team 
<Sirius> will show up!
data.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
data.processed:
󠁿With this hopefully some more girls that want to join Team 
󠁿<Sirius> will show up!

data.text:
It's not like we're lacking members, so there's no need to be so 
assertive while recruiting though……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿It's not like we're lacking members, so there's no need to be so 
󠁿assertive while recruiting though……

data.text:
But but, didn't we all decide to do this!? 
That we'd help spread the feelings that Team <Sirius> has built on!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿But but, didn't we all decide to do this!? 
󠁿That we'd help spread the feelings that Team <Sirius> has built on!

data.text: ……By the way, why are you wearing your Racing Uniform, Spe?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿……By the way, why are you wearing your Racing Uniform, Spe?

data.text:
Eh? On the other hand, I was wondering why everyone is only 
wearing their school uniform. Yesterday, Gold Ship-san said 
we would be wearing our Racing Uniforms―
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? On the other hand, I was wondering why everyone is only 
󠁿wearing their school uniform. Yesterday, Gold Ship-san said 
󠁿we would be wearing our Racing Uniforms―

data.text:
Well of course, if they see "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" running 
around it'll be great for getting attention, don't you think?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿Well of course, if they see "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" running 
󠁿around it'll be great for getting attention, don't you think?!

data.text: I-I see……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿I-I see……?

data.text:
Alright Spe! As head of Team <Sirius>'s publicity wing, 
show 'em how you run……show 'em your gallantry!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿Alright Spe! As head of Team <Sirius>'s publicity wing, 
󠁿show 'em how you run……show 'em your gallantry!

data.text: Y-yeah!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Y-yeah!!

data.text: Hehee, as I thought, she looks her best when she's running.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: 󠁿Hehee, as I thought, she looks her best when she's running.

data.text: ……that's right.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿……that's right.

data.text: ……that's right.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿……that's right.

data.text: Uma Musume chasing down their dreams―
data.processed: 󠁿Uma Musume chasing down their dreams―

data.text:
For those girls, the ones that support them 
are the trainers and their teammates.
data.processed:
󠁿For those girls, the ones that support them 
󠁿are the trainers and their teammates.

data.text:
And then, those girls who have taken hold of their dreams, carry 
on those feelings on to the next dream
data.processed:
󠁿And then, those girls who have taken hold of their dreams, carry 
󠁿on those feelings on to the next dream

data.text: Everyone～! Let's work up the sweat of youth together～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Everyone～! Let's work up the sweat of youth together～!!

data.text: And then together with us, we'll fulfill your dream……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿And then together with us, we'll fulfill your dream……!
